personalInfo.name: Oleg
personalInfo.myDescription:
JavaScript & Typescript, Go language ‚ù§Ô∏è

6+ years of hands-on experience in Frontend and Backend Development for Fintech Companies:

Being PHP/JavaScript Developer, had experience with PHP from versions 5.5 to 8.2, working to find the to way completely remove all legacy code and implementing the development process for cross-team collaboration. Our development team has grown from one person to a whole department...

Technologies used: Laravel, Symphony, MySQL, Redis, Vue2, React, Go and many more

After some time I changed stack to Typescript/JavaScript/Go, developing some projects like CRM dashboard for internal use from scratch, monitoring system, some microservices. Implemented a lot of useful solutions for integrations between services and monitoring applications.

CI/CD - Microservices development and integration - Backend from scratch - Frontend from scratch

Databases SQL/noSQL: MariaDB, MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB

Technologies used: ExpressJS, NestJS, Nuxt3, Vue2, Vue3, Go-swagger, Web3

Participated in code review and team onboarding

interests.title: Hobbies
interests.firstBlock: Apart from being a web developer, I am engaged in raising my daughter, learning to play electronic percussion instruments, travelling and communicating with interesting people
interests.secondBlock: I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the frontend and backend web technology development world and coding in my personal projects! Especially I love go and web3 development
